channel.title: Biking on Grad Student Problems
channel.description: Recent content in Biking on Grad Student Problems

item.title: Shark Valley
item.description: The next day I drove early morning to Shark Valley. This visitor center is at the center of what are called the historical Everglades but now it is practically the northern entrance. There is a single 15 mile biking trail at this visitor center. You can rent a bike for $9 per hour which is what I did. Along the way to Shark Valley you can see a lot of airboat tour advertisement which I was tempted to try, but because of the cold it was unlikely that I’ll be able to see much.
